state.unicode: Set around Napoleon's youth, the campaign tutorial will teach the player the basics of the campaign game whilst developing Napoleon's character via the narration of one of his most trusted advisors Bertier. Starting in Corsica the player will learns the basics of Total Wars campaign game and then board Napoleon onto a ship for the French mainland. As the player progresses through France, Napoleon will be receive various traits and achievements to further develop the idea of character progression. These traits/achievements will be awarded when the player successfully completes one of the many missions in the tutorial which are based on key events in Napoleon's early life. With each mission completed, additional regions of France will become unlocked and made available from behind the shroud, culminating in the Siege of Toulon where the player will play the battle tutorial and finish the tutorial campaign.
